name: The Construct (itch) (Aaron Wise)
description:
The door behind you slams shut violently. You snap to your senses wondering how you got here. You are in a maze of seemingly similar corridors.

You see a dark room to the north.

A well lit room to the west & a damaged altar to the east.

What do you do?

Experience a new & exciting choose your own adventure game with a rich & deep story set in a horror sci-fi world. Do you choose to go north & take the object in front of you & take the chance of loosing your life? Or do you explore every room in search of hope & a way to escape The Construct?

An old school text adventure game built in unity.

Controls:

Use commands with nouns to move such as:

go north                                                                                                                                                                        go east                                                                                                                                                                            go west                                                                                                                                                                          go south

"inventory" to display your backpack contents

"use" + item name to use an item

"examine" + item name to get more details about the item

"take"+ item name to pick up the item
